backend/main.mo: Main backend canister implementing storage, access control, user approval, file and folder metadata management, and admin‑restricted configuration such as canister IDs and app version 0.3.87.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping feature requests to affected frontend files, components, test IDs, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing functionality of all major frontend files including components, hooks, and utilities.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point defining root element and loading the main frontend script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Top‑level React app handling authentication, access control bootstrap, profile flow, conditional UI routing, and query cleanup when access is lost.
frontend/src/components/AccessDenied.tsx: Component showing a pending‑approval message with copyable Principal ID and instructions for contacting an admin.
Empty placeholder file for admin management UI logic.
frontend/src/components/FileList.tsx: Main file browser component supporting search, navigation, uploads, folder creation, deletion, drag‑and‑drop, file preview modal, and breadcrumb handling.
frontend/src/components/FilePreviewModal: Modal component that loads and previews files of various types with navigation, fullscreen, and download support.
frontend/src/components/FileUpload.tsx: Empty file placeholder for a file upload component.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Simple footer displaying attribution and a link to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: App header handling authentication, profile display, admin panel access, and theme toggling.
frontend/src/components/ManagePanel.tsx: Admin dialog for managing members, roles, storage stats, and removing users with reactive UI updates.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetup.tsx: Form for creating a user profile with username validation and uniqueness checks.
frontend/src/components/ThemeToggle.tsx: Button toggling between light and dark themes using next-themes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAccessBootstrap.ts: Hook that ensures access control initialization runs once per session and refreshes related queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity and refreshes dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements a React context and provider for Internet Identity authentication, managing identity loading, login, logout, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for user access checks, profiles, file operations, and admin interactions using an actor backend.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets up Tailwind base styles and theme variables for light and dark modes via CSS custom properties.
frontend/src/lib/appVersion.ts: Exports the current application version string.
frontend/src/lib/canisterIds.ts: Resolves backend and frontend canister IDs from multiple environment and runtime sources with fallbacks.
frontend/src/lib/fileLinks.ts: Provides helpers for constructing full direct file URLs and copying them to the clipboard with toast notifications.
frontend/src/lib/fileTypes.ts: Offers utility functions for determining file extensions, MIME types, and whether files are previewable.
frontend/src/lib/searchNormalize.ts: Includes functions for Unicode-aware, case-insensitive search normalization and substring matching.
frontend/src/lib/subtreeIndex.ts: Computes a set of folder IDs representing a subtree by indexing and recursively traversing child folders.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes the React app, wrapping it with query and Internet Identity providers before rendering.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration enabling dark mode, custom colors, animations, and container settings, with plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project state file describing current fix requests, known issues, and feature requirements related to file preview, search behavior, and UI layout changes.
